## Koatty.getPerformanceMetrics() method

Get comprehensive performance metrics

**Signature:**

```typescript

            global: number;
            protocols: Record<string, number>;
        };
        connectionPools?: Record<string, any>;
    };
```

{ middlewareStacks: { global: number; protocols: Record&lt;string, number&gt;; }; connectionPools?: Record&lt;string, any&gt;; }
